import i8 from "../image/i8.PNG"; import "./Book.css"; function Book({id,Name, Author, Publisher,Image, Availability,Ledger,deleteBook,editBook}) { return ( <>
{/* */}
{Name}
Author:{Author}
Publication:{Publisher}
Avability:{Availability}
Ledger:{Ledger}
{/* */} UserScreen setName(e.target.value)}> setAuthor(e.target.value)}> setPublisher(e.target.value)}> setAvailability(e.target.value)}> setLedger(e.target.value)}> setfile(e.target.files[0])}>
); } export default Book;
